name: The Succulent Note - Set of 16
description:
You know you do it, too. You sift through your pile of mail. Past the bills, past the ads, searching for something … something unpredictable, something with some life to it, something with an actual stamp and handwritten ink.

	Oh yes, I open one of those first … and I’m willing to bet you do, too.

	You will receive 16 perfect ‘Succulent Notes’ and clean white envelopes. They are the little black dresses of notes; perfect for every occasion.

	Thank You ♥ Congratulations ♥ Happy Birthday to You ♥ My Sympathies are with You ♥ We had an Amazing Visit ♥ Well Done ♥ I Love You ♥ You Rock!

	The cards are printed on a heavy, linen stock that just about begs for your thoughts in ink. They will arrive, ribbon tied, and with plain backs – no ‘www.this shop.com’ to be found. That means these can easily become ‘YOUR’ signature notes, and I promise … I will never give away your secret.

	Please inquire about larger quantities. ♥ Sent first class with delivery confirmation.
